participant_1.background:
I have a warm, welcoming smile that makes people want to be my friend.
i love to cut down trees.
sometimes i wish i did not have to wake up in the morning.
I love to tinker with my convertible car and take it for a spin on the weekends.
i work for the discovery channel creating videos.

participant_2.background:
I try to start my mornings with a fresh cup of coffee and a healthy breakfast.
i design jewelry when i have spare time.
i love to read fantasy novels and poetry.
I sometimes get a little too nostalgic when I think about my childhood.
i love to fish.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
Hi there, I'm doing well thanks! How are you doing?
I'm doing good, thanks for asking!
I'm a big fan of fantasy novels, what are some of your favorites?
Oh, I love fantasy novels too! Some of my favorites are the Harry Potter series, the Lord of the Rings series, and the Wheel of Time series.
I've heard great things about the Harry Potter series, but I've never read them. I've read the Lord of the Rings series though, and I loved it!
I highly recommend the Harry Potter series, it's a really fun and exciting read.
I'll have to check it out sometime!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, fish, and design jewelry.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I love to read too, but I haven't done much fishing. What kind of jewelry do you design?
I mostly make earrings and necklaces, but I've also made a few bracelets and rings.
Wow, that's really cool! I've never tried making jewelry before.
It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to express your creativity.
I might have to give it a try sometime
